sentences.sContent: Thus, the construction of the brain and the cytology, biophysics, and biochemistry of its component neurons reflect its fundamental function—to mediate behavior.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus, the construction of the brain and the cytology, biophysics, and biochemistry of its component neurons reflect its fundamental function—to mediate behavior.
sentences.sCn: 神经元的在大脑中的构建，以及它的细胞学、生物物理学和生物化学都表现着它作为大脑基础构件的基本功能，也正是这些功能在调节着行为。

sentences.sContent: In 1898 he identified what he termed the "internal reticular apparatus"; the identification of this structure, which would later be named the Golgi complex, was a major breakthrough in cytology.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1898 he identified what he termed the "internal reticular apparatus"; the identification of this structure, which would later be named the Golgi complex, was a major breakthrough in cytology.
sentences.sCn: 1898年，他鉴别出了被他命名为“细胞内部的网状结构”的结构；对于这一结构——现在被称为高尔基体——的鉴别，是细胞学上一个重大的突破。

words.tran: 细胞生成的；细胞发生的
胞体质的；细胞质的（等于cytoplasm）
[细胞] 胞质分裂；细胞浆移动
[生化] 细胞分裂素；[生化] 细胞激动素

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of cells from living things
